ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Thinking ??? C mon man, you are referring to Verant s tuning and dev teams, yes? Personally, I don t think much thought went into a few of the changes,
ygData.messageBody:
"Thinking" ??? C'mon man, you are referring to Verant's tuning and dev
teams, yes? Personally, I don't think much thought went into a few of the
changes, especially including this song. Examples: Adding god death touches
to "ENHANCE" the difficulty of a zone...puh-lease. Flipping the crappy loot
drop ratios between Fear and Hate. Fear was shitty, Hate was candy. Let's
switch em around and maybe no one will notice? Let's make bards look as gay
as possible when running with selos! Let's add 3 statics mobs to the SW
corner of Hate that respawn every 30 minutes and almost always drop armor!
That will stop those damn safe-spot campers. WOO.

Honestly, there have been some good changes in the past, but Verant is so
going band-aid when they should be going traction when it comes to fixes and
changes.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
50th Bard of Veeshan


>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
>Date: Wed, 12 Apr 2000 09:31:56 -0600
>
>I thought this song was a little odd, but assumed that someone made a
>mistake when posting the info on it. You could never really hope to use
>this on yourself in a battle and weaving it in with other songs isn't
>possible if it only lasts one tick. Any ideas what they were thinking?
>
> Kit
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal [mailto:birdman@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2000 9:23 AM
>To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] New songs!!!
>
>
>On Wed, 12 Apr 2000, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> > so completely un-bardlike. another wasted slot in our spellbook as far
>as
>i
> > can tell.
>
>This song appears to be most useful in power-levelling twinks, something I
>thought Verant wasn't big on. I'm sure it'll get changed somehow soon.
>
>Athren Notechaser
